metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2469 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
GNU SASL libgsasl server-side read-out-of-bounds with malicious authenticated GSS-API client

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gsasl - 1.8.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libgsasl7 - 1.8.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: gsasl package in esm-apps/focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
